meanings.definition: A chemical compound that is a form of vitamin E.
meanings.sent1: Tocopherol is important for maintaining good health.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to include tocopherol in my diet for its benefits.
meanings.sent3: Why did the walnut go to the party? To mingle with tocopherol!
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like tocopherol, bringing a sense of vitality.
meanings.sent5: The doctor emphasized the significance of tocopherol for overall well-being.

meanings.definition: A natural antioxidant found in vegetable oils and nuts.
meanings.sent1: Including tocopherol in your meals can help protect your cells.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on tocopherol to boost their immune system.
meanings.sent3: Why did the peanut get a medal? For being a great source of tocopherol!
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like tocopherol, shielding me from harm.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of tocopherol in nuts are truly remarkable.
